message:
Where is the Government?
Courtesy: http://alalodulal.org/

BCL Cadres. © Daily Star/Banglar Chokh

Look at the photos. Such dramatic poses. It feels like a dramatic film. But sadly, for us, it’s real life.

Oh wait, the caption on these photos says “BCL cadres”  So I suppose the correct answer is, government has just handed over duties to freelance gunmen. That is a recipe for stability, I am quite sure. I can see tomorrow’s headlines. BCL shoots BNP. BCL shoots Hifazat. BCL shoots Jamaat. BCL shoots pakhi. Or it, pakhi’r moto gooli. Mone thake na.

Anyway, I am sure BCL cadres running riot in Chittagong with guns will bring stability to the nation. It worked before, with BCL and JCD, didn’t it?

Even worse, these photos ran in Daily Star. Not exactly the most anti-government platform. When even Daily Star is running photos of BCL cadre in gunfight, you know things are very bad indeed.

I want to wake up from this nightmare. But when I close my eyes, nothing changes.
